name: Dissonance (itch)
description:
Explore open world laboratory by solving puzzles using primary game mechanic - dissonance. What it does? Find out yourself. Stylish sci-fi-monitor-esc graphics and aesthetics in two colors - white and grey.

Well, it's been half a year of development, I am happy to announce this game and hope you will like it. It's free, though you can donate (if you are not familiar with this website).

Some hints for the game (not very important, but still):

Backspace will add grid overlay effect on screen

If you are not okay with pixel interpolation, try pressing "9".

Use right mouse button to investigate a lot, it really helps!

THE GAME IS PACKED WITH 2 LANGUAGES (ENGLISH + RUSSIAN), YOU CAN SWITCH THEM ANY TIME BY PRESSING "ENTER" BUTTON.

Finally, big sorry for the lack of MAC and Linux versions, only for windows. AND big thanks to Pavel Hedberg and Gleb Bespoyasniy (Павел Хедберг и Глеб Беспоясный) for the soundtrack, it just fits perfectly.

For any questions, write here: alexrumarthegreat@gmail.com, or in the comments below, if you encounter any bugs, write me an email!

Enjoy!
